author: costin
msg: Added a map based on the type of the mbean.
Improved the search code for mbeans-descriptors - walk the object hierarchy,
keep track of files we already processed, support .ser format if present.
The idea is to look automatically fro an mbean-descriptors.[ser,xml] in the
same package with the object beeing registered, and in parents.
